name: Love, Jane DEMO
description:
Your one true love, Jane, will be arriving in only four nights!

She's sent you a list of several chores to complete before she gets here. Venture throughout your disheveled house and make sure everything is prepared for her grand arrival.

Don't waste time, or you may run out of it.

Use WASD keys to move and press space to interact with objects.

For the best experience, play with headphones in a dark environment.

PROGRAMMED AND CREATED BY:
Michael Valentino

ART BY:
Michael Valentino, Sharm, and Tuomo Untinen

SOUND BY:

Michael Valentino and Nick Saidel (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCit7MCQR6SvE4w-7ifD_d2w)

A GAME BY TEAM HELIX
